channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- CX-Supervisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- CX-Supervisor

item.title: CVE-2018-19011|2024-08-05T11:23:08.918Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior) can execute code that has been injected into a project file. An attacker could exploit this to execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-19018|2024-08-05T11:23:08.584Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: An access of uninitialized pointer vulnerability in CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior) could lead to type confusion when processing project files. An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-19020|2024-08-05T11:23:08.827Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: When CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior) processes project files and tampers with the value of an offset, an attacker can force the application to read a value outside of an array.

item.title: CVE-2018-19017|2024-08-05T11:23:08.580Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: Several use after free vulnerabilities have been identified in CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior). When processing project files, the application fails to check if it is referencing freed memory. An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-19019|2024-08-05T11:23:08.810Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: A type confusion vulnerability exists when processing project files in CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior). An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-19015|2024-08-05T11:23:08.820Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: An attacker could inject commands to launch programs and create, write, and read files on CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior) through a specially crafted project file. An attacker could exploit this to execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-19013|2024-08-05T11:23:08.924Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: An attacker could inject commands to delete files and/or delete the contents of a file on CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior) through a specially crafted project file.
